title: mcpc+报错的问题
author: 背着书包丶
txt_content:
05.02 07:28:44 [Server] INFO A world backup will be automatically created in your saves directory.
05.02 07:28:44 [Server] INFO If you continue the missing blocks/items will get removed.
05.02 07:28:44 [Server] WARN Forge Mod Loader detected missing blocks/items.
05.02 07:28:44 [Server] ERROR Unidentified item: craftguide:craftguide_item, id 4096
05.02 07:28:44 [Server] INFO Found a missing id from the world craftguide:craftguide_item
05.02 07:28:44 [Server] INFO Injecting existing block and item data into this server instance
05.02 07:28:44 [Server] ERROR This world was saved with mod voxelmap which appears to be missing, things may not work well
05.02 07:28:44 [Server] ERROR This world was saved with mod inventorytweaks which appears to be missing, things may not work well
05.02 07:28:44 [Server] ERROR This world was saved with mod craftguide which appears to be missing, things may not work well
05.02 07:28:44 [Server] ERROR This world was saved with mod DamageIndicatorsMod which appears to be missing, things may not work well
05.02 07:28:44 [Server] ERROR This world was saved with mod ArmorStatusHUD which appears to be missing, things may not work well
05.02 07:28:44 [Server] ERROR This world was saved with mod bspkrsCore which appears to be missing, things may not work well
05.02 07:28:44 [Server] INFO This world was saved with mod Forge version 10.12.2.1121 and it is now at version 10.13.3.1403, things may not work well
05.02 07:28:44 [Server] INFO This world was saved with mod FML version 7.2.211.1121 and it is now at version 7.10.114.1388, things may not work well
05.02 07:28:44 [Server] INFO This world was saved with mod mcp version 9.03 and it is now at version 9.05, things may not work well复制代码为什么会这样？我自己放了个主城的地图，然后就不给开啦。。。

replies.author: Mccraft-pepsi
replies.txt_content: 那个地图有大量其他mod的信息，你载入地图后，文件信息重头不兼容了

replies.author: 背着书包丶
replies.txt_content:
Mccraft-pepsi 发表于 2016-2-4 23:55
那个地图有大量其他mod的信息，你载入地图后，文件信息重头不兼容了
不，那个地图是原版纯净的，只是后来家里匠魂、工业就这样子
